title: An Honest Conversation on Racial Reconciliation (Ft. Zach & Megan Duke)
description: Jordan and Matt talk with their close friends, Zach and Megan, as they teach us what is truly required to achieve racial reconciliation from a biblical perspective. The solution might surprise you.
author: matt@jordanleedooley.com (Jordan Lee Dooley)
